hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base

Class Option.Error<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Option<T>
      • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.base.Option.Error<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the element type
    Enclosing class:
    Option<T>

    public static final class Option.Error<T>
extends Option<T>
    Class representing an error option. Calling value on this will throw a RuntimeException which wraps the original exception.
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2011.01.30.
